com.vangav.backend.dispatcher

  • Classes in com.vangav.backend.dispatcher used by com.vangav.backend.cassandra.keyspaces.dispatch_message 
    Class and Description
    DispatchMessage
    DispatchMessage format should be JSON DispatchMessage is the parent class for all messages to be passed to worker services through the dispatcher e.g.: push notifications, analysis/logging queries, etc ...
  • Classes in com.vangav.backend.dispatcher used by com.vangav.backend.dispatcher 
    Class and Description
    DispatcherProperties
    DispatcherProperties is the properties file with items like workers' ips/ports, etc ...
    DispatchMessage
    DispatchMessage format should be JSON DispatchMessage is the parent class for all messages to be passed to worker services through the dispatcher e.g.: push notifications, analysis/logging queries, etc ...
    DispatchMessages
    DispatchMessages is a json structure that holds multiple dispatch messages sharing the same worker service url
  • Classes in com.vangav.backend.dispatcher used by com.vangav.backend.play_framework.request 
    Class and Description
    Dispatcher
    Dispatcher is used to forward some of the work (like notifications, logging, etc ...) to other services to handle Why is that useful? let's say there's a POST_PHOTO_PUBLIC request, the work done for that request can be: 1- *Save photo in DataBase 2- *Distribute photo to user's friends 3- Distribute photo publicly to other users 4- Push notify photo receiving users 5- Save analysis data 6- Save logs 1 and 2 are the important steps that must happen before sending back response and must be finished super fast 3 to 6 has low business impact and can take much more time The dispatcher allows for allocating more resources to handle 1 and 2 while allocating less resources to handle 3 to 6 so that usage spikes doesn't affect the user experience
  • Classes in com.vangav.backend.dispatcher used by com.vangav.backend.push_notifications.android.dispatch_message 
    Class and Description
    DispatchMessage
    DispatchMessage format should be JSON DispatchMessage is the parent class for all messages to be passed to worker services through the dispatcher e.g.: push notifications, analysis/logging queries, etc ...
